name: The Funny Thing About The Deer
name_original: The Funny Thing About The Deer
description:
A year or two ago, during the cold cold winter...

The Funny Thing About The Deer is a text-based game which tells a spooky story from your past. A story about a deer. Don't you remember the deer?

  • Explore your childhood home
  • Recall memories from long ago
  • Turn to your thoughts for company...
  • Sleep. Dream.

Playtime: ~20 minutes.
